definition: floating between zither and sword (idiom); fig. wandering aimlessly with no tenured position
guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
